alert.note: Alert for Mendocino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 15 at 5:33AM PDT until March 15 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northwest California, including the following county, Mendocino. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 531 AM PDT, portions of Highway 1 are flooded due to water overflowing the Garcia River. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Southwestern Mendocino County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
